languages.text: "Я принял высшую миссию, единственный среди моих братьев. Пока они сдерживают зло молитвами и святыми символами, выгравированными в предательской плоти, я принимаю его в себя. Я поглощаю грех и зло как воду! Но они не в силах навредить мне, ведь я — средоточие святости. Я — священный фильтр, звено, защищающее прочие детали Машины от разъедающей скверны. И покуда я пребываю тут, скверна не восторжествует!"

"I have accepted a higher calling, the only one among my brethren to do so. As they keep the evil at bay with prayers and sacred symbols engraved on their traitorous flesh, I take this evil inside myself. I imbibe it as one does water! But it can do me no harm, for I am the eye of sanctity. I am the sacred filter, the link that protects other parts of the Machine from this caustic taint. And for as long as I remain here, the corruption will not prevail!"
languages.original_text: "Я принял высшую миссию, единственный среди моих братьев. Пока они сдерживают зло молитвами и святыми символами, выгравированными в предательской плоти, я принимаю его в себя. Я поглощаю грех и зло как воду! Но они не в силах навредить мне, ведь я — средоточие святости. Я — священный фильтр, звено, защищающее прочие детали Машины от разъедающей скверны. И покуда я пребываю тут, скверна не восторжествует!"

traits.locale_text: "I have accepted the higher mission, the only one among my brethren. As they keep the evil at bay with their prayers and sacred symbols engraved on the traitorous flesh, I take this evil inside myself. I consume sin and evil like water! But they can do me no harm, for I am the eye of sanctity. I am the sacred filter, the link that protects other parts of the Machine from the caustic taint. And for as long as I remain here, the corruption will not prevail!"

"I have accepted the higher mission, the only one among my brethren. And for as long as I remain here, the corruption will not prevail!"

languages.text: “我已经接受了更加崇高的使命，我也是我的兄弟之中唯一接受了使命的人。那些人通过祈祷与刻在孱弱肉体上的神圣记号来阻止邪恶时，而我却会让这种邪恶进入我的身体。我像喝水一样，饱饮着罪恶与邪恶，但邪恶无法伤害我，因为我是圣洁的眼睛。我是神圣的过滤器，我会保护机器的其他部分不受腐化的影响。只要我还活着，腐化就无法得逞！”
languages.original_text: "I have accepted a higher calling, the only one among my brethren to do so. As they keep the evil at bay with prayers and sacred symbols engraved on their traitorous flesh, I take this evil inside myself. I imbibe it as one does water! But it can do me no harm, for I am the eye of sanctity. I am the sacred filter, the link that protects other parts of the Machine from this caustic taint. And for as long as I remain here, the corruption will not prevail!"

traits.locale_text: “我已经接受了更加崇高的使命，我也是我的兄弟之中唯一接受了使命的人。那些人通过祈祷与刻在孱弱肉体上的神圣记号来阻止邪恶时，而我却会让这种邪恶进入我的身体。我像喝水一样，饱饮着罪恶与邪恶，但邪恶无法伤害我，因为我是圣洁的眼睛。我是神圣的过滤器，我会保护机器的其他部分不受腐化的影响。只要我还活着，腐化就无法得逞！”

languages.text: «He aceptado una llamada superior. Soy el único de mis hermanos en hacerlo. Mientras ellos mantienen a raya el mal con plegarias y símbolos sagrados grabados en su traicionera carne, yo acepto el mal en mi interior. ¡Lo bebo como si fuera agua! Pero no puede afectarme, porque soy el ojo de la santidad. Soy el filtro sagrado, el enlace que protege al resto de la máquina de esta contaminación cáustica. Mientras permanezca aquí, ¡la corrupción no prevalecerá!».
languages.original_text: "I have accepted a higher calling, the only one among my brethren to do so. As they keep the evil at bay with prayers and sacred symbols engraved on their traitorous flesh, I take this evil inside myself. I imbibe it as one does water! But it can do me no harm, for I am the eye of sanctity. I am the sacred filter, the link that protects other parts of the Machine from this caustic taint. And for as long as I remain here, the corruption will not prevail!"

traits.locale_text: «He aceptado una llamada superior. Soy el único de mis hermanos en hacerlo. Mientras ellos mantienen a raya el mal con plegarias y símbolos sagrados grabados en su traicionera carne, yo acepto el mal en mi interior. ¡Bebo la maldad y el pecado como si fueran agua! Pero no pueden afectarme, porque soy el ojo de la santidad. Soy el filtro sagrado, el enlace que protege al resto de la máquina de esta contaminación cáustica. Mientras permanezca aquí, ¡la corrupción no prevalecerá!».

languages.text: 「私は同胞の中で唯一、至高の天命を受けた。同胞が祈り、不忠の肉に神聖なシンボルを刻んで悪を食い止めている間に、その悪を自分の中に引き受けているんだ。この体は水のように受け止める！だが罪も悪も私には手も足も出ない…私こそが神聖な目なのだから。私は聖なるフィルターで、腐食した汚れから機械の残りの部分を守るつなぎ目だ。そして私がここにいる限り、腐敗が勝利することはない！」
languages.original_text: "I have accepted a higher calling, the only one among my brethren to do so. As they keep the evil at bay with prayers and sacred symbols engraved on their traitorous flesh, I take this evil inside myself. I imbibe it as one does water! But it can do me no harm, for I am the eye of sanctity. I am the sacred filter, the link that protects other parts of the Machine from this caustic taint. And for as long as I remain here, the corruption will not prevail!"

traits.locale_text: 「私は同胞の中で唯一、至高の天命を受けた。同胞が祈り、不忠の肉に神聖なシンボルを刻んで悪を食い止めている間に、その悪を自分の中に引き受けているんだ。この体は水のように受け止める！だが罪も悪も私には手も足も出ない…私こそが神聖な目なのだから。私は聖なるフィルターで、腐食した汚れから機械の残りの部分を守るつなぎ目だ。そして私がここにいる限り、腐敗が勝利することはない！」

languages.text: "Ich habe eine höhere Berufung angenommen, als einziger meiner Brüder. Während sie das Böse mit Gebeten und heiligen Symbolen auf ihrem verräterischen Fleisch auf Distanz halten, nehme ich das Böse in mir selbst auf. Ich trinke es, als wäre es Wasser! Aber es kann mir nichts anhaben, denn ich bin das Auge der Unverletzlichkeit. Ich bin der heilige Filter, die Verbindung, die andere Teile der Maschine vor diesem ätzenden Makel schützt. Und solange ich hier bleibe, wird die Verderbtheit nicht siegen!"
languages.original_text: "I have accepted a higher calling, the only one among my brethren to do so. As they keep the evil at bay with prayers and sacred symbols engraved on their traitorous flesh, I take this evil inside myself. I imbibe it as one does water! But it can do me no harm, for I am the eye of sanctity. I am the sacred filter, the link that protects other parts of the Machine from this caustic taint. And for as long as I remain here, the corruption will not prevail!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe eine höhere Berufung angenommen, als einziger meiner Brüder. Während sie das Böse mit Gebeten und heiligen Symbolen auf ihrem verräterischen Fleisch auf Distanz halten, nehme ich das Böse in mir selbst auf. Ich trinke die Sünde und das Böse, als wären sie Wasser! Aber sie können mir nichts anhaben, denn ich bin das Auge der Unverletzlichkeit. Ich bin der heilige Filter, die Verbindung, die andere Teile der Maschine vor diesem ätzenden Makel schützt. Und solange ich hier bleibe, wird die Korruption nicht siegen!"

languages.text: « J'ai répondu à l'appel d'une vocation supérieure, le seul parmi mes frères à le faire. Tandis qu'ils tiennent le mal à distance grâce à leurs prières et aux symboles sacrés gravés sur leurs chairs traîtresses, j'accueille la corruption en mon sein. Je l'absorbe comme une éponge absorbe l'eau ! Mais le mal ne peut rien contre moi, car je suis l'œil de la sainteté. Le filtre sacré, le maillon qui empêche le poison de contaminer les autres parties de la Machine. Et tant que je resterai ici, la corruption ne triomphera pas ! »
languages.original_text: "I have accepted a higher calling, the only one among my brethren to do so. As they keep the evil at bay with prayers and sacred symbols engraved on their traitorous flesh, I take this evil inside myself. I imbibe it as one does water! But it can do me no harm, for I am the eye of sanctity. I am the sacred filter, the link that protects other parts of the Machine from this caustic taint. And for as long as I remain here, the corruption will not prevail!"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai répondu à l'appel d'une vocation supérieure, le seul parmi mes frères à le faire. Tandis qu'ils tiennent le mal à distance grâce à leurs prières et aux symboles sacrés gravés sur leurs chairs traîtresses, j'accueille la corruption en mon sein. J'absorbe le péché et le mal comme une éponge absorbe l'eau ! Mais ils ne peuvent rien contre moi, car je suis l'œil de la sainteté. Le filtre sacré, le maillon qui empêche le poison de contaminer les autres parties de la Machine. Et tant que je resterai ici, la corruption ne triomphera pas ! »

languages.text: "Yüreğimi daha kudretli bir çağrıya açtım. Kardeşlerim arasında bu yolu izleyen bir tek benim. Onlar duaları ve hainlikle etlerine kazıdıkları kutsal sembolleriyle şeri uzak tutarken ben, bu şerle bir bütün olmayı seçtim. Su gibi içime işledi. Fakat ben her şeyi kutsal filtreden geçiririm, bundandır ki bana zarar veremez. Makine'nin diğer kısımlarını bu onur kırıcı lekeden nelerin koruyacağına ben karar veririm. Ben burada olduğum sürece yozlaşmanın çabaları beyhude olacaktır!"
languages.original_text: "I have accepted a higher calling, the only one among my brethren to do so. As they keep the evil at bay with prayers and sacred symbols engraved on their traitorous flesh, I take this evil inside myself. I imbibe it as one does water! But it can do me no harm, for I am the eye of sanctity. I am the sacred filter, the link that protects other parts of the Machine from this caustic taint. And for as long as I remain here, the corruption will not prevail!"
